mapper.select: select m.room_id, room_name, room_description, room_owner_id, m.state, to_char(m.create_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as create_at, to_char(m.update_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as update_at from m_room m left outer join t_room_member on m.room_id = t_room_member.room_id and t_room_member.user_id = #{userId} where t_room_member.user_id = #{userId} OR room_owner_id = #{userId}
